other_tests.findings: Compound heterozygous mutation (R120X/R770X) in the SBP2 gene.
Symmetrical generalized peripheral sensitive neuropathy affecting the legs.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Further evaluations have shown slow progression of the neuropathy.

other_tests.procedure_name: Serum selenium and GPx3 activity measurement
other_tests.findings: Serum selenium levels were undetectable and plasma GPx3 activity was considerably reduced (11 U/g hemoglobin; normal range 27.5â€“73.5).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Selenium supplementation normalized serum selenium and GPx3 levels but not SEPP levels.

other_tests.findings: Marked hypotrophy, especially involving the adductor magnus and biceps femoris.
Accentuation of reduction of forced expiratory and inspiratory flows.
